description: Returns a list of all the databases in the kdb environment.

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the kdb environment.

nested_items.name: kxDatabases
nested_items.description: A list of databases in the kdb environment.

nested_items.name: databaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the kdb database.

nested_items.name: createdTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the database was created in FinSpace. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds. For example, the value for Monday, November 1, 2021 12:00:00 PM UTC is specified as 1635768000000.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The last time that the database was modified. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds. For example, the value for Monday, November 1, 2021 12:00:00 PM UTC is specified as 1635768000000.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that indicates where a results page should begin.
